entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 5:59 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:59 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
